body.p: Reporting from the second European Gentoo Developer Conference, this week's Gentoo Weekly Newsletter contains information about a new intermediate release of Gentoo Linux 2005.1 for some architectures, and carries the announcement of the GWN's availability as an RSS feed! This and other news, including a reminder for Friday's upcoming Gentoo Day in Italy, press clippings, bugzilla statistics and security announcements wrap up this week's edition of your friendly newsletter. Enjoy reading!
